item.description:
Networking happy hour - 5.30-8.30pm - at front bar or in the back. If nobody is in front, check the back! If nobody is there yet, wait, we usually have 10-20 people. Suggestions welcome for other events. Networking will be monthly at 116 Crown, 2nd Wednesday at 5.30-8.30pm rain or shine.

Feel free to bring samples for show-and-tell.

Time: 5.30pm-8.30pm
Date: Wednesday, March 11
Place: 116 Crown, downtown New Haven

Please RSVP!

- David
item.how_to_find_us: Front bar or back raised area
item.name: Greater New Haven Design and Marketing April Meetup
